name: HP 1200w Multi-function WiFi black and white Laser Printer
description: Get the HP 1200w Wireless black and white Printer and bid goodbye to your printing woes. Equipped with a laser imaging drum, this printer lets you print up to 5X pages before the toner levels need to be restored

name: Canon G3020 Multi-function WiFi Color Printer
description: Designed for high volume printing, this affordable wireless 3-in-1 printer combines low-cost printing with easy wireless setup and convenient maintenance.

name: Canon EOS 90D
description: The Canon EOS 90D is designed for those who are out to sharpen their photography skills. The camera lets you shoot high-quality 4K videos, derive images from 4K videos, shoot time-lapse videos, and more. Its 32.5 MP APS-C size sensor allows you to capture images that have intricate details and are crisp and sharp. To top it off, the EOS 90D also takes great photographs in low-light settings too.

name: SONY Alpha ILCE-6400L Mirrorless Camera
description: Bring out the photographer in you and experiment with filmmaking with this Sony Alpha ILCE-6400L Mirrorless camera. It offers exceptional AF performance, high-quality images with low noise, Innovative Image-processing System, and many other features that make filming videos and capturing images a lot more exciting.

name: Mi Bedside Lamp 2
description: Are you looking for a bedside lamp that has the adjustable brightness feature? If yes, bring home the Mi Smart Bedside Lamp 2 that gives you the freedom of choosing colours as well as brightness levels. This lamp is Wifi-enabled and can be controlled using voice assistants such as Alexa and Google Assistant. You can also control it with the Mi Home app.

name: Mi Smart LED 1S Table Lamp
description: If you do not want to disturb your partner while reading or working on your desk late at night, then you can take help of this Mi Smart LED lamp. It is easy to operate. It is also compatible with Google Assistant, Alexa, and more, so you can control it via them. You can fold it too. Whatâ€™s more, it features a knob for easy usage.
